captions.text: >>I WARNED YOU NOT TO GO BEHIND MY BACK DAVID.

THIS SCIENTIFIC DISCOVERY WILL BE MINE AND
MINE ALONE.
>>YOU'RE SO STRONG CECILIA, LIKE YOUR MOTHER.
I MEAN, THAT WOULD HAVE BEEN THE PERFECT MOMENT.
>>YEAH, I DON'T KNOW-- I DON'T KNOW HOW
>>I THOUGHT IF I GOT INTO IT MAYBE--
>>WHO KNOWS HOW THESE THINGS ARE SUPPOSED TO GO RIGHT?
I JUST THOUGHT YOU WERE GONE.
>>NO, I JUST ZONED OUT FOR A MINUTE.
I SPY WITH MY LITTLE EYE--
OH, I THINK THIS IS IT.
>>YOU KNOW, LOOKING BACK ON ALL OF THIS,
WE PROBABLY COULD'VE GOTTEN YOU TO THE HOSPITAL BY NOW.
I GOT YOU GOOD ON THAT ONE!

>>[LAUGHING UNCOMFORTABLY] WHEN ARE YOU GOING
TO DIE?

title: Most Awkward Death Scene of All Time - Studio C
